Rulings.Tengu:
●You select which Spell & Trap Card Zone to make unusable when you activate Mystical Cards of Light.
●You cannot activate Mystical Cards of Light if you do not have a Spell & Trap Card Zone to make unusable.
●Drawing 2 cards with Mystical Cards of Light does not start a Chain.
●You can choose to draw only 1 card.
●You cannot choose to draw 2 cards if you have 1 card remaining in your Deck.
●If Mystical Cards of Light's effect is negated, you can activate or Set Spell and Trap Cards into the unusable Spell & Trap Card Zone. If the effect of Mystical Cards of Light is reapplied while a Spell or Trap Card is in the unusable Spell & Trap Card Zone, the Spell & Trap Card Zone become unusable when the Spell or Trap Card is removed from the field.

Rulings.Base:
1. You select which Spell & Trap Card Zone to make unusable when you activate "Mystical Cards of Light".
2. You cannot activate "Mystical Cards of Light" if you do not have a Spell & Trap Card Zone to make unusable.
3. Drawing 2 cards with "Mystical Cards of Light" does not start a Chain.
4. You can choose to draw only 1 card.
5. You cannot choose to draw 2 cards if you have 1 card remaining in your Deck.
6. If the effect of "Mystical Cards of Light" is negated, you can activate or Set Spell and Trap Cards into the unusable Spell & Trap Card Zone. If the effect of "Mystical Cards of Light" is reapplied while a Spell or Trap Card is in the unusable Spell & Trap Card Zone, the Spell & Trap Card Zone become unusable when the Spell or Trap Card is removed from the field.
